_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Average height above sea level of the GCU or GCU polygon.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Height above sea level in meters extracted from the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service - EU-DEM. The average is calculated for the area defined by the polygon.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Average slope of the GCU.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Slope generated using the elevation dataset. The average is calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Average aspect of the GCU.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Aspect generated using the elevation dataset. The average is calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Land cover classification with 2 thematic classes (Broadleaved / Coniferous).

_description.iso_639_3_eng:
The [Copernicus DLT](https://land.copernicus.eu/pan-european/high-resolution-layers/forests/dominant-leaf-type/status-maps/dominant-leaf-type-2018?tab=mapview) raster product provides a basic land cover classification with 3 thematic classes (All *non-tree covered areas* / *Broadleaved* / *Coniferous*) at 10m spatial resolution and covers the full of EEA39 area. The data refers to the unit polygons and the value is obtained by a mode reducer.

In this dataset we only track *Broadleaved*  and *Coniferous*, *non-tree covered* areas are not tracked.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Land Surface Temperature (skin temperature)of the GCU.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Monthly average land surface temperature in Kelvin. The monthly average is calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Land Surface Temperature (skin temperature) of the GCU during summer month.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Maximum monthly land surface temperature in °C. The average of the maximum values of the GCU area is computed for the polygon foot print of GCU boundaries.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Relative humidity (RH) refers to the moisture content (i.e., water vapor) of the atmosphere, expressed as a percentage of the amount of moisture that can be retained by the atmosphere (moisture-holding capacity) at a given temperature and pressure without condensation.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Relative humidity is [calculated](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dew_point) using the temperature and the dewpoint temperature at 2 meters above surface.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Average tree height of the GCU.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Average tree height of the GCU in meters. The average is calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Average GCU above-ground biomass.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Average GCU above-ground biomass in t/ha. The average is calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Average GCU Normalized Difference Vegetation Index.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Monthly average GCU Normalized Difference Vegetation Index. The average is calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Maximum GCU Normalized Difference Vegetation Index.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Remotely sensed monthly maximum GCU Normalized Difference Vegetation Index. The average of the maximum values is calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries. Beware that for some GCU (i) there are no shapefile available so that the average Land surface temperature over a 5km buffer around the GCU coordinate is taken.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Average GCU Leaf Area Index.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Monthly average GCU Leaf Area Index. The average is calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Maximum GCU Leaf Area Index.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Quantile 90% of the monthly average GCU Leaf Area Index over the GCU Polygon when the polygon is available. If the polygon is not available methods is still to be defined.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Average GCU Gross Primary Productivity.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Monthly average GCU Gross Primary Productivity in kg/m2.The average is calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Average of the Annual Sum of Gross Primary Productivity.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Average of the annual sum of GCU Gross Primary Productivity in kg/m2.The monthly average is first calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries. Then the sum is realised for all month of a year and divided by the number of year in the time series (2003-2021 here).

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Average GCU Normalized Difference Water Index.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Monthly average GCU Normalized Difference Water Index. The average is calculated for the GCU area defined with the polygon of GCU boundaries.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Averaged canopy height iver the polygon in meters.

_title.iso_639_3_eng: Area of the GCU foot print

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Area of the GCU foot print computed from the shapefile.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Beware that for some GCU there are no shapefile available in which case NA is reported here.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Temporal trends of the remotely sensed LAI.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Slope the relationship between remotely sensed LAI over the GCU and time (LAI/month).

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Temporal trends of the remotely sensed NDVI.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Slope the relationship between remotely sensed NDVI over the GCU and time (NDVI/month).

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Temporal trends of the remotely sensed NDWI.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Slope the relationship between remotely sensed LAI over the GCU and time (NDWI/month).

_title.iso_639_3_eng: Trend (temporal dynamics) in GCU Max Land surface temperature

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Temporal trends of the remotely sensed max land surface temperature.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Slope the relationship between remotely sensed maximum land surface temperature of the GCU and time (K/month).

_title.iso_639_3_eng: Trend (temporal dynamics) in Average GCU Biomass

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Temporal trends of the remotely sensed average biomass.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Slope the relationship between remotely sensed biomass of the GCU and time (t/ha/year).

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Temporal trends of the remotely sensed GPP.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: Slope the relationship between remotely sensed biomass of the GCU and time (Kg C/m2/month).

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Elevation assessed in the circular plot with the GPS Garmin 64s.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: See the WP2 protocol for more information.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Slope assessed in the circular plot with the clinometer, see the WP2 protocol for more information.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: The slope is measured in the plot area defined with the circular boundaries (15m of radiius).

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Aspect assessed in the circular plot with the clinometer, see the WP2 protocol for more information.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: The aspect is measured in the plot area defined with the circular boundaries (15m of radiius).

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Micro-topography is assessed at the scale of the plot according to an index ranging from 1 to 3.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: The index allows to determine whether there is more in- or outflow of water. See the WP2 protocol for more information.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Forest stand structure assessed (by eye) at forest stand level (in the functional subset area).

_description.iso_639_3_eng: See the WP2 protocol for more information.

_definition.iso_639_3_eng: Composition of the forest stand assessed  (by eye) at forest stand lavel in the functional subset area.

_description.iso_639_3_eng: See the WP2 protocol for more information.
